Package com.irurueta.units

package com.irurueta.units
Performs distance and surface unit conversion and formatting.
  • Class
    Description
    Acceleration
    Contains an acceleration value and unit.
    AccelerationConverter
    Does acceleration conversions to different units.
    AccelerationFormatter
    Formats and parses acceleration value and unit.
    AccelerationUnit
    Enumerator containing recognized typical acceleration units.
    Angle
    Contains angle value and unit.
    AngleConverter
    Does angle conversions to different units.
